forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco enjoys a brisk afternoon, with the sun breaking through the cloud cover, casting a warm glow across the cityscape as it approaches the late afternoon hour. The temperature hovers near a comfortable sixty-six degrees, although it's set to dip slightly as the day wears on. A steady west-southwest breeze dances around at twenty-one miles per hour, bringing a refreshing note to the air and creating a gentle rustle in the trees lining the streets. While the horizon may be clear, the familiar fog that envelops the bay is conspicuously absent today, allowing for unobstructed views toward landmarks that define the charming skyline.

As the evening approaches, expect a transition into partly cloudy skies, with temperatures settling around fifty-four degrees. This delightful shift invites a cozy layering of clothing—perhaps a light jacket paired with an elegant scarf, perfect for a casual stroll along the waterfront or a quiet gathering at a local café. The evening atmosphere may beckon you outdoors, allowing the pleasant breeze and gentle murmur of the ocean to cradle the end of your day. Activities could range from enjoying a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park to indulging in a good book at one of the town's tranquil spots. All in all, it seems an ideal day to savor the simple pleasures of city life, where you can reap both warmth and coolness as the sun begins to dip below the horizon.
